page.title: 06DYKE GOLF CLUB
page.content: The{Dyke Golf Club}was founded in 1910 and now has over 750 members. They have just built a new clubhouse which opened on the 10th April 1985. The old clubhouse built in 1946 is to be demolished to improve the car park. The clubhouse is smart and members have to be tidily dressed in the bar. There are changing rooms for members who wish to change from outdoor wear. It costs Â£250 to join and another Â£200 annual subscription. Most older people can afford to pay for a year and have more time to play. Younger golfers who perhaps cannot afford to pay for a year can pay a green fee everytime they play. Many people play 3 or 4 times a week. The club holds social events as well. They hold lots of competitions on the course. It normally takes about 3 hours to play a round of golf.
